entry.title: The Ocean in Your Eyes
entry.summary: I’m swimming in the ocean in your eyes It is vast and wide Forever it holds me I float in that ocean The waves carry me Gentle breezes Swaying to and fro Even when seas get stormy the sun shines brightly again And I’m still…
entry.content:
I’m swimming in the ocean in your eyes
It is vast and wide
Forever it holds me
I float in that ocean

The waves carry me
Gentle breezes
Swaying to and fro

Even when seas get stormy the sun shines brightly again
And I’m still there floating in the ocean of your eyes

It is a very comfortable place
Familiar and safe
I’ve been here before caught in the ocean in your eyes

Your ocean is expansive
I’m a mere drop of water
Part of something bigger than myself

The ocean in your eyes is no ones to contain, to control
I’m in awe and wonder

I see myself in the ocean in your eyes
I wail up in tears
My eyes weep a drop and we swirl together
Not knowing where one begins and the other ends

Blissfully in wonderment, I witness the beauty and grace
The power and force of the ocean in your eyes
Mesmerized

I shake and tremble with ever-flowing love
The ocean in your eyes belongs to no one

Not everyone can see it
Nor comprehend the grandeur
Yet you offer it freely

The ocean in your eyes knows no lack, no scarcity, no limits

Boundless, formless, space, energy, infinity
The ocean in your eyes reminds me we are not alone
We are part of so much more

I see also pain in the ocean in your eyes
This conduit that transmits so easily the frequencies of everyone, everything
The ocean in your eyes is a beautiful reflection back to those who are ready to see.
I see myself in the ocean in your eyes in a way I’ve never seen before.

I choose to see, to look, to feel and do my own work to heal

You are safe behind the reflection of the ocean in your eyes
You see people looking there, you see what they see, safely behind the reflection

No one can own the ocean in your eyes
They may try to siphon some for themselves or take a bucket full out

The ocean in your eyes is abundance, your connection to source
Ever present, it washes over you, it grounds you when you let it

Thank you for showing me the ocean in your eyes
For letting me swim and swirl
Feel my respect and awe, my deep admiration

For the ocean in your eyes does not belong to me, to anyone

The ocean in your eyes is freedom
Let the ocean breeze guide your waves
Your connection to source, your compass

entry.title: Whirlwind
entry.summary: I'm in a whirlwind Tossing and turning Flying high Breaking barriers Freeing my mind Taking flight Anything is possible So many layers Bottom up Top down My eyes are open Seeing it all Flying by Grooving Leaving the past Reshaping Rebuilding Regenerating I'm in a…
entry.content:
I'm in a whirlwind
Tossing and turning
Flying high
Breaking barriers
Freeing my mind

Taking flight
Anything is possible
So many layers
Bottom up
Top down

My eyes are open
Seeing it all
Flying by
Grooving
Leaving the past

Reshaping
Rebuilding
Regenerating

I'm in a whirlwind
Moving fast
Taking it slow
Vibrating higher
Than I ever know

Life is meant to live
Living is being alive

Leave the old beliefs
Let the whirlwind
Carry you away

entry.title: A Good Life
entry.summary: Intro I wanted more, From life I didn’t get to do, everything, i wanted Cuz I wanted more, from life I always thought there’d be more time V1 I overcame, my childhood burdens I learned to, take care of myself One step at a time,…
entry.content:
Intro
I wanted more, From life
I didn’t get to do, everything, i wanted
Cuz I wanted more, from life
I always thought there’d be more time

V1
I overcame, my childhood burdens
I learned to, take care of myself
One step at a time, I improvised, Improved my life, My circumstance
Moved to Hollywood, the land of dreams
Made my way, all the way, to Beverly Hills
Swimming pools, movie stars

PRE

V2
I desired, the finer things in life,
I worked hard, so I could fit in
One event at a time, I connected, saved my money, got fancy clothes
Met movie stars, the rich and famous
Before you know it, I hobnobbing
Beach parties, private clubs

PRE

Chorus
Oh so grateful for a good life
Wasn’t always easy, this life
Oh so grateful for a good life
Wasn’t always easy, this life

V3
Later in life, I found true love
4th of July, sucking on toes
Hawaii life, became your wife
Our love story, so real, so true
Met all your friends, over all night dinners
Now I’m a valley girl, with 9 step kids
Movie nights, Cadillac margaritas

Bridge
Our story, ended way to soon,
So grateful, life with you

Chorus out 

Lyrics: Vicki Langford.  Guitar: Marty Simon.  Drums:  Zev Stein. 

This audio file is from a recording i did using bandlab with just the guitar track and then my vocal.  At the time the band practices stopped, I hadn't written lyrics for this piece.  This piece ended up being very special as it became a tribute to my sister, Jeannie Larson, who passed in Nov 2023.  I got the bulk of the song done in Sep 2023 and my sister was able to hear that.  I finished this the night before and the morning of her burial in Jan 2024.  This was played at her service.  #love

entry.title: Force Of Life
entry.summary: Sometimes I'm a hurricane Sometimes I'm a sunny day I'm a force of nature And can't be contained Controlled My energy courses through all life We are one energy Force of Life Let the wind blow And the thunder roar Let it all wash over…
entry.content:
Sometimes I'm a hurricane
Sometimes I'm a sunny day

I'm a force of nature
And can't be contained
Controlled

My energy courses through all life
We are one energy
Force of Life

Let the wind blow
And the thunder roar
Let it all wash over and through

Respect me
Be in awe of me

Sometimes I'm the rainbow
After the storm
Sometimes I'm the summer breeze

Sometimes my lightning crashes and
Causes damage

All my forms are necessary
They all serve a purpose

I'm all powerful and control nothing
I'm awe inspiring and seek no validation

entry.title: floating through the air
entry.summary: i'm a big balloon floating through the air I have a long string it flails around unattached, I float higher and higher stuck in the clouds please someone grab it hold it tight, keep me grounded please someone let me go don't hold me back…
entry.content:
i'm a big balloon
floating through the air
I have a long string
it flails around
unattached,
I float higher and higher
stuck in the clouds

please someone grab it
hold it tight,
keep me grounded

please someone let me go
don't hold me back

back and forth
hold it
let it go

the string is my physical form
the balloon is my mental state
I've always had a love-hate relationship with my physical form.
give the string for free to anyone willing to grab it
pull the string away and never let anyone get close

keep the string taut
maintain a safe distance from its holder

Wait, I don't need another to keep me grounded
another to prove I'm worthy
I can hold my own string

holding my string
complete and aware
healthy safe
being my whole self
I show up in the world
grounded and flying high

entry.title: End of the Day
entry.summary: V1 We grew apart Through years of wear Fighting for so long I am playing Out old patterns I’m bored with myself I’m not leaving Who you are I’m finding myself PC I’m just going through the motions At the end of the day Chorus…
entry.content:
V1
We grew apart
Through years of wear
Fighting for so long

I am playing
Out old patterns
I’m bored with myself

I’m not leaving
Who you are
I’m finding myself

PC
I’m just going through the motions
At the end of the day

Chorus
At the end of the day
Your love is confining, restraining, limiting
Expects to be a way
A way I've outgrown
At the end of the day

V2
Checked the boxes
I was told to check
thought it meant success

Getting by was
Me shutting down
Just hiding my pain

Scared of failure
Scared of the unknown
Cant give up on myself

PC
I’m just going through the motions
At the end of the day

Chorus (2nd time through)
At the end of the day
My love was exacting, demanding, commanding
Expects me to be a way,
A way I’ve outgrown
At the end of the day

BRIDGE

PC
I’m DONE going through the motions
At the end of the day

V3
Left the comforts
Of an unfulfilling life
Had to build a new

Piece by piece
It all fell apart
Something new emerged

Stripped down
I found my joy
of a life that’s free

PC
I’m NOT going through the motions
It’s a brand new day


Lyrics: Vicki Langford.  Guitar: Marty Simon.  Drums:  Zev Stein. 

This audio file is from band practice 2023-0623. At the time of this recording, the third verse hadn't been written.  This band never had a name nor did we ever perform any of these songs live nor record them in a studio.

entry.title: Another Year Around The Sun
entry.summary: Intro V1 I’m writing you this song to celebrate the day The sun is coming into view Ready To start a new So Rise and shine And Start the day Lets take our time today Don’t move too fast We’ll savoir every second Full of…
entry.content:
Intro

V1
I’m writing you this song
to celebrate the day

The sun is coming into view
Ready To start a new

So Rise and shine
And Start the day

Lets take our time today
Don’t move too fast

We’ll savoir every second
Full of Songs and laughs

So take it slow
And enjoy the day

PC
Let's be together
Lets celebrate
Lets be together
No time to wait

One more year,
Spinning ‘round the sun

V2 x2
I'm singin you this song
To share my love with you

You brighten all my days
Just you being you

So thank you kind
the day is yours

Da dah da da da da

PC
lets be together
Lets be one
Let's be together
And have some fun

One more year
Spinning ‘round the sun

Chorus
Today we celebrate
Near or far
It Doesn’t matter where we are

Lets get together
All for one
Its Another year around the sun

Another year around the sun

Solo x 2

V3 x 2
Sun is setting in the west
A Fire in the sky

The Moon is climbing up the tree
Coming into view

So Praise today
And light the fire

As we finish up the day
I wanted you to know

I am so grateful to share
This life with you

So full of grace
We say good night

Lyrics: Vicki Langford.  Guitar: Marty Simon.  Drums:  Zev Stein. 

This audio file is from band practice 2023-0623.  This band never had a name nor did we ever perform any of these songs live nor record them in a studio.

entry.title: Tightrope
entry.summary: Intro  V1 walking a tightrope Churning away never see sky Walking a tightrope Numbing myself to oblivion Walking a tightrope So tired not getting any sleep Walking a tightrope My Mind is ..sinking deep Pre Chorus  I want to have fun before I get old…
entry.content:
Intro 

V1
walking a tightrope
Churning away never see sky
Walking a tightrope
Numbing myself to oblivion
Walking a tightrope
So tired not getting any sleep
Walking a tightrope
My Mind is ..sinking deep

Pre Chorus 
I want to have fun
before I get old
On this tightrope

I want to be free
before i go cold
On this tightrope

V2
Im walking a tightrope
Longing for those summer skies
Im walking a tightrope
Life was so carefree and wild
Im walking a tightrope
Throw all our cares away
Im walking a tightrope
Longing for the long days

Pre Chorus 
I want to have fun
before I get old
On this tightrope

I want to be free
before i go cold
On this tightrope

Chorus 
What's it all for.
What's it all mean.
The struggle is real
Just a cog in the machine

Bridge 
The chorus is the exit

What's it all for.
What's it all mean.
Im gonna step off
This tightrope
For good

Lyrics: Vicki Langford.  Guitar: Marty Simon.  Drums:  Zev Stein. 

This audio file is from band practice 2023-0623. This band never had a name nor did we ever perform any of these songs live nor record them in a studio.

entry.title: Touched
entry.summary: V1 Spinning round and round lather rinse and repeat days look the same control alt delete Going through the motions All systems go And then One day Bammmm Chorus You touched me Touched so deep I saw the light When you touched me. V2 Living…
entry.content:
V1
Spinning round and round
lather rinse and repeat

days look the same
control alt delete

Going through the motions
All systems go

And then
One day

Bammmm

Chorus
You touched me
Touched so deep
I saw the light
When you touched me.

V2
Living on cruise control
hustling and grinding

mindlessly doing my thing
masterminding

Pattern disrupted
Major Malfunction

Because
That day

Powww

Chorus
You touched me
Touch so deep
I saw the light
When you touched me

*Solo*

Bridge
Stimulated
Captivated
Inspired
Awakened
Enlightened
Desired
Excited

Transformed 

Lyrics: Vicki Langford.  Guitar: Marty Simon.  Drums:  Zev Stein. 

This audio file is from band practice 2023-0623. This band never had a name nor did we ever perform any of these songs live nor record them in a studio.

entry.title: Too much talking
entry.summary: We made small talk We shared stories We talked opinions We shared philosophy We laughed and joked We teased delightfully I had fun but The only thing wrong with last night Was too much talking Talking is overrated Talking is a waste of breath Lets…
entry.content:
We made small talk
We shared stories
We talked opinions
We shared philosophy

We laughed and joked
We teased delightfully

I had fun but
The only thing wrong with last night
Was too much talking

Talking is overrated
Talking is a waste of breath
Lets save our breath for a kiss

Let's put our mouths together
Breathe in and out

We conversated
Discussing decisions like
Should we go to the club tonight
Or just stay home

We talked to friends
We talked to strangers

I had fun but
The only thing wrong with last night
Was too much talking

Talking is overrated
Talking is a waste of breath
Lets save our breath for a kiss

Let's put our mouths together
Breathe in and out

We discussed work
We worried about money
While we dreamed of vacations
Lifestyles of the rich and famous

We discussed the future
We analysed the past

You know what was wrong with last night
Too much talking.

Talking is overrated
Talking is a waste of breath
Lets save our breath for a kiss

The night dragged on and on
Too much talking

I'm in my head too much
There's a lot of noise in there

Just hold me now
Kissing is better than words.
